American Express (AMEX) Travel is an NYU preferred travel agency that automatically registers travel plans and updates travel changes with Worldcue. You can book your entire trip online or speak with one of Amex's Travel Specialists who can help you plan your trip.           Book Online          Use American Express Online (AEO) to book your air, hotel, rail (Amtrak) and rental car arrangments. Convenient and easy to use, AEO provides you with preferred rates with major airlline, hotel, and car rental partners, and helpful, personalized travel information. Explore all the features AEO offers travelers in the AMEX User Guide (PDF) .          Please note, complex international reservations should be booked via phone. Complex international is defined by AMEX as any reservation which exceeds the following:     Max of 4 segments   Max 1 carrier   US Departure   Max 1 international destination           Book By Phone          AMEX Travel Customer Service is available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. To make a reservation over the phone, call +1-888-477-0451. Press 1 for navigational assistance with American Express online, or press 2 for agent assistance/executive assistance. Please note, a fee applies for agent assisted reservations.     Please note, you may make a reservation for a non NYU Net ID holder, however, these reservations may only be made via a phone agent, and must be made by an NYU Net ID holder.                          Need Help? Register       Book NYU travel on your own? You must register or update your itinerary with NYU's traveler safety service.                                    Amex         AMEX Travel       +1-888-477-0451             or              Egencia             An Expedia Company        +1-877-613-4284                                        New        Provide new travel information                    or               Update        Provide updates to existing itineraries                                                     NYU Traveler was created to provide the NYU community with tools and services for their travel needs and to help keep them safer. University-related travel may now be booked or registered through NYU Traveler.   From this site, you can use your NYU NetID and password to book on-line reservations for air, rail, hotel, or car with either Egencia (an Expedia company) or American Express Travel, or you can call an agent at Egencia or AMEX Travel via the telephone numbers provided. By using one of these agencies, your travel plans will be automatically connected to Worldcue, a traveler safety service NYU has enlisted to provide you with up-to-the-minute information of potential threats to your safety during your travels, and to enable the University to get in touch with you to render aid in the event of an emergency.   Choice was an important precept for us in designing this system. You can elect to make your NYU-related travel arrangements through other means and then register your travel itinerary with Worldcue.                                  EMERGENCIES   NYU Public Safety: +1 212-998-2222  Consult your Worldcue Trip confirmation e-mail for local emergency authority contacts. NYU to Napa   November 9 – November 12, 2015    More information and registraion coming soon.
